alert.note: Alert for Jones (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 08 at 12:59AM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Jones County through 145 AM CDT... At 1259 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Funston, or near Anson, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lueders, Nugent, Funston and The Intersection Of Us- 180 And Farm Road 600. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
